name: GrammarBot
description: The GrammarBot API provides spelling and grammar checking capabilities to your application. Submit text and receive a JSON response with potential errors and suggested corrections.

api_methods.name: check
api_methods.description: GrammarBot will check the 'text' parameter for any spelling and/or grammatical errors, and respond with suggested corrections.

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: Susan go to the store everyday

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Only en-US or en-GB are supported at this time

utterances.utterance: Can you check this sentence for errors: 'She don’t know the answer.'
Please review the grammar in this text: 'Their going to the park later.'

parameters.text: Their going to the park later.

utterances.utterance: Is there anything wrong with this sentence: 'He has went to the store.'

parameters.text: He has went to the store.

utterances.utterance: Check this text for spelling mistakes: 'I recieved your message yesterday.'
Can you correct this sentence: 'Me and him went to the movies.'

parameters.text: Me and him went to the movies.

utterances.utterance: Review this text for grammar errors: 'The cat laid on the sofa all day.'

parameters.text: The cat laid on the sofa all day.

utterances.utterance: Is this sentence correct: 'Each of the students are responsible.'

parameters.text: Each of the students are responsible.

utterances.utterance: Check this text for any mistakes: 'She has less friends than him.'

parameters.text: She has less friends than him.

utterances.utterance: Can you verify the grammar in this sentence: 'The data suggests that the hypothesis are correct.'

parameters.text: The data suggests that the hypothesis are correct.

utterances.utterance: Please check this text for errors: 'He don’t like apples.'
